description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Fire

Standard

Reach 3

+25 vs AC; 2d6+7 damage plus 1d12 fire damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+25 vs AC; 1d10+7 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes two claw attacks or one bite attack, and then shifts 1 square.

Immediate Reaction

Targets the triggering enemy

Trigger: When an enemy moves, enters, or leaves an adjacent square,

+23 vs Fortitude; 2d8+7 damage, the target is knocked prone, and the dragon shifts 2 squares.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Fire

Standard

Close blast 5

+23 vs Reflex; 4d10+7 fire damage, and the dragon pushes the target 3 squares. Miss: Half damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it. If the dragon is flying, it can shift 10 squares before making this attack

At-Will ✦ Fire

Standard

Ranged 15

+23 vs Reflex; 2d8+7 fire damage. Effect: Each creature adjacent to the target takes 2d8 fire damage.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +23 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

Encounter ✦ Fire

Free, After Using Breath Weapon Or Fire Stream

Any creature hit by the triggering attack also takes ongoing 10 fire damage and is dazed (save ends both).
